Container.Name: unifi-controller
Container.Overview: The Unifi-controller(https://www.ubnt.com/enterprise/#unifi) Controller software is a powerful, enterprise wireless software engine ideal for high-density client deployments requiring low latency and high uptime performance.
Container.Changes:
### 2021-06-11 - Allow for changing Java initial mem via new optional environment variable.
### 2021-01-12 - Deprecate the `LTS` tag as Unifi no longer releases LTS stable builds. Existing users can switch to the `latest` tag. Direct upgrade from 5.6.42 (LTS) to 6.0.42 (latest) tested successfully.
### 2020-07-17 - Rebase 64 bit containers to Bionic and Mongo 3.6.
### 2020-06-16 - Add logrotate.
### 2020-06-02 - Updated port list and descriptions. Moved some ports to optional.
### 2019-11-14 - Changed url for deb package to match new Ubiquity domain.
### 2019-07-29 - Allow for changing Java mem limit via new optional environment variable.
### 2019-03-23 - Switching to new Base images, shift to arm32v7 tag.
### 2019-02-10 - Initial release of new unifi-controller image with new tags and pipeline logic

Config.Name: Port: 1900
Config.Description: Required for `Make controller discoverable on L2 network` option

Config.Name: Port: 8843
Config.Description: Unifi guest portal HTTPS redirect port

Config.Name: Port: 8880
Config.Description: Unifi guest portal HTTP redirect port

Config.Name: MEM_LIMIT
Config.Description: Optionally change the Java memory limit (-Xmx) (default is 1024M).

Config.Name: MEM_STARTUP
Config.Description: Optionally change the Java initial memory (-Xms) (default is 1024M).
